name: part_004
file: tmp_大神ミオ５周年記念ライブ『ナイトループ』【 ホロライブ ⧸ 大神ミオ 】 [YqPVwYLcvrY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs 'Camelia' on a stage featuring a glowing cherry blossom tree under a starry sky.
A cinematic MC section where Ookami Mio reflects on her 5 years of activity while walking through a futuristic night city and metro station.
Ookami Mio performs 'Yuurei Tokyo' (Ghost City Tokyo) in a night city setting with dynamic visual effects.

subtitles.original: ここに咲いてること
subtitles.english: That I am blooming here...

subtitles.original: 覚えていて
subtitles.english: ...please remember it.

subtitles.original: 君に出会うことができて本当に良かった。
subtitles.english: I'm so glad I could meet you.

subtitles.original: これからも君の居場所になれるように
subtitles.english: So that I can continue to be your place to belong...

subtitles.original: いつでもふと思い出してもらえるように
subtitles.english: ...so that you can remember me anytime...

subtitles.original: ホロライブで咲き続けるからね
subtitles.english: ...I'll keep blooming in Hololive.

subtitles.original: ねえ、今日が何の日か覚えてる？
subtitles.english: Hey, do you remember what day it is today?

subtitles.original: そう、うちがホロライブで活動始めて5年経ったんだよ。
subtitles.english: That's right, it's been 5 years since I started in Hololive.

subtitles.original: うーん、色んなことがあったけど、
subtitles.english: Hmm, a lot of things happened, but...

subtitles.original: 楽しかったなって思うことの方が多かったかな。
subtitles.english: ...I think there were more times I thought it was fun.

subtitles.original: 本当だよ。君にも出会うことができたしね。
subtitles.english: It's true. I was able to meet you, too.

subtitles.original: え、もう行っちゃうの？
subtitles.english: Eh, are you leaving already?

subtitles.original: そっか、君にも色々あるよね。
subtitles.english: I see, you have various things going on too.

subtitles.original: でも大丈夫。
subtitles.english: But it's okay.

subtitles.original: またきっと会えるよ。
subtitles.english: I'm sure we'll meet again.

subtitles.original: 幽霊東京
subtitles.english: Yuurei Tokyo

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：Ayase
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Ayase

subtitles.original: 燦々と輝く街の明かり
subtitles.english: The town lights shining brilliantly

subtitles.original: 対照的な僕を見下ろす
subtitles.english: Looking down at me in contrast

subtitles.original: あのビルの間を抜けて
subtitles.english: Passing between those buildings

subtitles.original: 色付き出したネオンと混じって
subtitles.english: Mingling with the neon lights that have begun to color

subtitles.original: 僕の時間とこの世界をトレード
subtitles.english: Trading my time with this world

subtitles.original: 夜に沈む
subtitles.english: Sinking into the night

subtitles.original: 終電で家路を辿る僕の目に映る
subtitles.english: Reflected in my eyes as I make my way home on the last train

subtitles.original: ガラス窓にいたのは夢見た自分じゃなくて
subtitles.english: In the glass window wasn't the me I dreamed of

subtitles.original: 今にも泣き出してしまいそうな
subtitles.english: Looking like I'm about to burst into tears

subtitles.original: 暗闇の中一人彷徨っている
subtitles.english: Wandering alone in the darkness

subtitles.original: 哀しい人
subtitles.english: A sad person

subtitles.original: 「大丈夫、いつか大丈夫になる」なんて思う日々を
subtitles.english: Days of thinking "It's okay, someday it'll be okay"

subtitles.original: いくつか重ねた
subtitles.english: Piled up a few of them

subtitles.original: 今日だって一人東京の景色に透ける僕は
subtitles.english: Even today, alone, I'm transparent against the Tokyo scenery

subtitles.original: 幽霊みたいだ
subtitles.english: Like a ghost

subtitles.original: 失うことに慣れていく中で
subtitles.english: As I get used to losing things

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまったあの願いさえも
subtitles.english: Even those wishes I had forgotten

subtitles.original: 思い出した時に涙が落ちたのは
subtitles.english: The reason tears fell when I remembered

subtitles.original: この街がただ
subtitles.english: Is just that this town...

subtitles.original: あまりにも眩しいから
subtitles.english: ...is just too bright

subtitles.original: 「散々だ」って笑いながら嘆く
subtitles.english: Lamenting "It's terrible" while laughing

subtitles.original: ハイテクな日々の中の火の思いがフラッシュバック
subtitles.english: Memories of those days flash back in these high-tech days

subtitles.original: 気付けば朝まで開くロジック
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, logic opens until morning

subtitles.original: 僕の言葉を音に乗せて何度も
subtitles.english: Putting my words to sound over and over

subtitles.original: 失うことに慣れていく中で
subtitles.english: As I get used to losing things

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまったあの日々でさえも
subtitles.english: Even those days I had forgotten

subtitles.original: それでもまだ先へなんて思えるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I can still think about moving forward

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: Is because you are here

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: こんな寂しい街で
subtitles.english: In such a lonely town...

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: 燦々と輝く街の明かり
subtitles.english: The town lights shining brilliantly

subtitles.original: 対照的な僕を見下ろす
subtitles.english: Looking down at me in contrast

subtitles.original: あのビルの先で手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out beyond those buildings

subtitles.original: あの日夢見た景色を望んで
subtitles.english: Wishing for the scenery I dreamed of that day

subtitles.original: 僕の時間とこの世界をトレード
subtitles.english: Trading my time with this world

subtitles.original: 明日を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Calling tomorrow

subtitles.original: 失うことに慣れていく中で
subtitles.english: As I get used to losing things

subtitles.original: 失くさずにいた大事な思いを
subtitles.english: Those precious feelings I didn't lose

subtitles.original: 抱きしめたら不意に涙が落ちたのは
subtitles.english: When I embraced them, tears suddenly fell because...

subtitles.original: この街でまだ生きてたいと思うから
subtitles.english: ...I want to keep living in this town

subtitles.original: 君もそうでしょう
subtitles.english: You feel the same, right?
